item.description:
The Institute Of Contemporary Art (ICA) in Boston is having its Halloween fundraiser event this Friday, 10/31, 9 PM - 1 AM.

ICA just added a great deeply discounted $50.00 ticket option (with cash bar) for more folks to join the fun. ( Other options: the $100 - $125 ticket open bar, VIP lounge )

Natasha, our fun-loving BostonLOA member, is one of the creative event coordinators for this Halloween event. She has already "bewitched" a number of us members to help with the event & provide lots of "cackling" entertainment.

So transform yourself (costumed, masked) and join us for lots of ghoulish entertainment, scrumptious nibbling and of cos, dance the nite away…while contributing to a great cause to enhance contemporary art culture in Boston!!

(1) Details & purchase tickets here:

http://www.icaboston....

(2) Please RSVP "YES" on our meetup site too... we'll look out for each other at event. It'll be fun to guess who's who before the bewitching midnite hour "unmasking". ;o)

Bring your friends and yes, appreciate your passing the info along……

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Come "raise" lots of Halloween Fun Vibes at ICA this Friday, 10/31
